mapper.update: UPDATE "clazz" SET "name" = NVL(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "name"), "room" = NVL(#{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "room"), "begin_date" = NVL(#{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, "begin_date"), "end_date" = NVL(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, "end_date"), "master_id" = NVL(#{masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "master_id"), "subject" = NVL(#{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "subject"), "create_time" = NVL(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "create_time"), "update_time" = NVL(#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "update_time") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "dept" SET "name" = NVL(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "name"), "create_time" = NVL(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "create_time"), "update_time" = NVL(#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "update_time") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "emp" SET "username" = NVL(#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "username"), "password" = NVL(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "password"), "name" = NVL(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "name"), "gender" = NVL(#{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "gender"), "phone" = NVL(#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "phone"), "job" = NVL(#{job,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "job"), "salary" = NVL(#{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "salary"), "image" = NVL(#{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "image"), "entry_date" = NVL(#{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, "entry_date"), "dept_id" = NVL(#{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "dept_id"), "create_time" = NVL(#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, "create_time") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "emp_course" SET "empId" = NVL(#{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "empId"), "courseId" = NVL(#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "courseId"), "period" = NVL(#{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "period") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "emp_expr" SET "emp_id" = NVL(#{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "emp_id"), "begin" = NVL(#{begin,jdbcType=DATE}, "begin"), "end" = NVL(#{end,jdbcType=DATE}, "end"), "company" = NVL(#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "company"), "job" = NVL(#{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "job") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "operate_log" SET "operate_emp_id" = NVL(#{operateEmpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "operate_emp_id"), "operate_time" = NVL(#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "operate_time"), "class_name" = NVL(#{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "class_name"), "method_name" = NVL(#{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "method_name"), "method_params" = NVL(#{methodParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "method_params"), "return_value" = NVL(#{returnValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "return_value"), "cost_time" = NVL(#{costTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "cost_time") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "student" SET "name" = NVL(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "name"), "no" = NVL(#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "no"), "gender" = NVL(#{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "gender"), "phone" = NVL(#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "phone"), "id_card" = NVL(#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "id_card"), "is_college" = NVL(#{isCollege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "is_college"), "address" = NVL(#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "address"), "degree" = NVL(#{degree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "degree"), "graduation_date" = NVL(#{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, "graduation_date"), "clazz_id" = NVL(#{clazzId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "clazz_id"), "violation_count" = NVL(#{violationCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, "violation_count"), "violation_score" = NVL(#{violationScore,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, "violation_score"), "create_time" = NVL(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "create_time"), "update_time" = NVL(#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "update_time") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "student_course" SET "student_id" = NVL(#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "student_id"), "course_id" = NVL(#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "course_id"), "period" = NVL(#{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "period"), "empCourseId" = NVL(#{empCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "empCourseId") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "student_login" SET "no" = NVL(#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "no"), "name" = NVL(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "name"), "password" = NVL(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "password") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE "student_operate_log" SET "operate_student_id" = NVL(#{operateStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "operate_student_id"), "operate_time" = NVL(#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "operate_time"), "operation" = NVL(#{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "operation"), "courseName" = NVL(#{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "courseName"), "period" = NVL(#{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "period") WHERE "id" = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
